DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research find whether train different exercise intensity reduce risk develop cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) different extent . Heart attack stroke lead cause death old woman . Reduced variability heart rate increase dip swing blood pressure risk factor predict chance develop CVD increase level clot protein fibrinogen plasminogen activator inhibitor 1 , high level LDL-cholesterol ( > 160mg/dl ) . We measure risk factor change body fat level start train 15 30 week train form walking . At present time effect exercise intensity factor well understood . This study add basic understanding issue allow u recommend postmenopausal woman optimal exercise intensity lose body fat reduce risk develop CVD .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Training Intensity CHD Risk Factors Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal preferably hormone replacement therapy In good general health Have body mass index ( BMI , weight kg/height m2 ) 25 40 Exercise le 20 min/day two day week
